name: Shadow Runner
description: Shadow Runner is a speedrun-oriented platformer, where you can use classical gameplay mechanics like dashing or double jumping, as well as more complex ones like the ability to switch between light and shadows as your character cannot stay in both.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD R9 280X DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD RX 470 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
